remarks: Value of the univariate polynomial evaluation map function. (Contributed by AV, 7-Sep-2019.)
statement:
evls1fval.q $e |- Q = ( S evalSub1 R ) $.
evls1fval.e $e |- E = ( 1o evalSub S ) $.
evls1fval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` S ) $.
evls1fval $p |- ( ( S e. V /\ R e. ~P B ) -> Q = ( ( x e. ( B ^m ( B ^m 1o ) ) |-> ( x o. ( y e. B |-> ( 1o X. { y } ) ) ) ) o. ( E ` R ) ) ) $.
$d B x y $.
